verses.name: Mark 7:17
verses.text: And when he was entered into the house from the people, his disciples asked him concerning the parable.

verses.name: Mark 7:18
verses.text: And he saith unto them, Are ye so without understanding also? Do ye not perceive, that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man, it cannot defile him;

verses.name: Mark 7:19
verses.text: Because it entereth not into his heart, but into the belly, and goeth out into the draught, purging all meats?

verses.name: Mark 7:20
verses.text: And he said, That which cometh out of the man, that defileth the man.

verses.name: Mark 7:21
verses.text: For from within, out of the heart of men, proceed evil thoughts, adulteries, fornications, murders,
